pages.text: In addition to using the Instrument Screen, there are several other ways that MIDI settings of instruments can be set.$(br2)To link instruments to a player's Transmitter, or to a Server Transmitter block, right click the player or block with the instrument to be linked.

To copy MIDI Settings from one instrument to another, place the two instruments next to eachother in a crafting grid. The instrument on the right will have its settings set to the values from the instrument on the left.
